r.s: Creating PDF on the fly with the PDFlib library
r.d:
This extension wraps the PDFlib programming library for processing PDF on the fly, available from PDFlib GmbH at http://www.pdflib.com.
More info on how to use PDFlib with PHP can be found at http://www.pdflib.com/developer-center/technical-documentation/php-howto
r.n: - fix problem in PHP 7 that when extending the PDFlib class it was not possible to access any members of the extended class.
